## Purpose & Products
Local value-add from regional crops (sesame, groundnut).

## Process Flow
```mermaid
flowchart LR
  A[Seeds] --> B[Cleaning]
  B --> C[Roasting]
  C --> D[Pressing]
  D --> E[Filtration]
  E --> F[Storage]
```

## Utilities
- Power: 150 kW peak
- Water: 2 m³/day
